portfolioPieces.name: Terrene Spire Hearth
portfolioPieces.desc:
Last Update: Feb 2017.
A one-page wonder HTML5 information repository.  Joint project between myself and Dexexe1234.  Intended for use alongside Dex's forum adventure.

portfolioPieces.name: Totally Tubular
portfolioPieces.desc:
Last Update: Dec 2015.
Unity3D endless runner, involving procedurally generated tubes and network play.  Download for Windows only.

portfolioPieces.name: Golems
portfolioPieces.desc:
Last Update: Dec 2015.
A PyGame-powered learning game targeted towards the One Laptop Per Child XO laptops for elementary-grade students.  Featured fully-autonomous combat, controlled by player code.
